subject: Re: Spiricom Device
author: psfponies
full_text:
Thanks I was able to open them that way. 

Kay


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@...> wrote:
>
> Kay, I can only open up .wav files on here for some reason.  
However, 
> I go to the folder, find the .mp3 file, right click and 
select "save 
> target as" to download it onto my desktop...then listen to it.
> 
> LC
>

> > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@> wrote:
> > > >
> > > > I formally thought "hoax," too, until I found how easy it is 
> for 
> > > > ghosts/spirits, etc to use these different devices we have 
> today 
> > to 
> > > > communicate through.  
> > > > 
> > > > It's almost as if the ability to talk to the other side has 
> been 
> > > > there the whole time, or better yet, that the other side has 
> > been 
> > > > communicating with us the whole time, but we simply needed 
to 
> > > > become "awakened" to it...
> > > > 
> > > > LC
> > > > 
> > > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Stefan Bion" <yahoogroups@> 
> > wrote:
> > > > >
> > > > > When I first listened to the Spiricom samples several 
years 
> > ago, 
> > > my 
> > > > immediate impression was: Hmm, it sounds like someone using 
> > > > an "electronic larynx" (speech aid device). This impression 
was 
> > > > strengthened by the observation that the buzzing sound often 
> was 
> > > even 
> > > > modulated by O'Neill's own voice during the dialoges between 
> him 
> > > > and "Dr. Mueller"! (Did O'Neill forget to remove the device 
> from 
> > > his 
> > > > throat while talking to his counterpart?)
> > > > > 
> > > > > And what about the "13 frequencies" that are supposed to 
be 
> > used 
> > > as 
> > > > the "carrier" for the spirit voices? Why aren't they audible 
in 
> > the 
> > > > recordings? And why does a mixture of the 13 tones created 
with 
> > > > Audition sound so different from the typical "Spiricom 
buzz"? - 
> > > Well, 
> > > > if you analyze the frequency spectrum of the buzzing sound 
> (this 
> > > can 
> > > > be done with Audition etc.), you will find a lot of 
harmonics 
> > > (peaks 
> > > > in the spectrum), and some of these harmonics more or less 
> match 
> > > the 
> > > > 13 Spiricom frequencies...
> > > > > 
> > > > > To me, the entire Spiricom saga produces more questions 
than 
> > > > answers...
> > > > > 
> > > > > ----- original Nachricht --------
> > > > >

O'Neil

> > > > it

sort 
> > of 
> > > > > > judgement.  Looking forward to seeing your website.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Alex
> > > > > >

> > > > > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Guy" <yzzzguy@> wrote:
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > In regards to the Spiricom story - I have to assume 
> you're 
> > > > referring to 
> > > > > > > the Mark IV model as diagrammed/written up in the 
> Spiricom 
> > > > manual (as 
> > > > > > > opposed to the INCORRECT diagram made by Polish 
> researcher 
> > > > Wojciech 
> > > > > > > Drewniak...http://www.worlditc.org/k_06_spiricom.htm ).
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > While my research is still not finished (and I've been 
> > > working 
> > > > on this 
> > > > > > > for a little over 2 years), I'm leaning toward the 
Mark 
> IV 
> > > > > > > conversations as having been hoaxed by Bill O'Neil. 
> > HOWEVER - 
> > > I 
> > > > believe 
> > > > > > > he acted alone and that none of the other members of 
the 
> > > > Metascience 
> > > > > > > Foundation were involved with this hoax. As to 
O'Neil's 
> > > > motivation for 
> > > > > > > the hoax - I still don't know. But I will also say 
that 
> > the 
> > > > veridical 
> > > > > > > evidence that O'Neil claims to have received about Dr. 
> > George 
> > > > J. 
> > > > > > > Mueller through clairaudience is amazing and it is 
tough 
> > to 
> > > see 
> > > > how 
> > > > > > > O'Neil would have gotten this information given his 
> > finances, 
> > > > location, 
> > > > > > > the timeframe, etc.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > I've been promising to get my personal website up and 
> > > operating 
> > > > for 
> > > > > > > some time now but have been busy. Hopefully soon. Then 
> > I'll 
> > > > start 
> > > > > > > posting what I have found out so far.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Guy Jackson
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > P.S. The recordings of the Spiricom cassette that can 
be 
> > > found 
> > > > at the 
> > > > > > > GOS website ( 
> > > http://www.ghostpix.com/spiricom/spiricom.html ) 
> > > > are very 
> > > > > > > poor. Scott L over at Ghostly Talk pulled much a much 
> > cleaner 
> > > > version 
> > > > > > > directly from a source cassette provided to him by 
Mark

and "Repost"
